3. Check the baby’s colour:
/lozenge6 Check for pallor.
/lozenge6 Check for jaundice. It is not normal if appears less than 24 hours aft  er birth and the 
palms and soles are yellow. Refer the baby to an FRU as per the steps for referral 
detailed in Box 17.
